settings.label: Select Position
settings.info: Choose where the wishlist button appears on your product page. Select 'Custom Placement' to manually specify a location using a CSS selector. [Help](https://help.getswym.com/en/articles/13249541-how-to-find-css-selectors-for-custom-button-placement)

settings.label: Custom Placement Selector
settings.info: Enter a CSS selector of the parent element to anchor the button. Only used if Button Position is set to 'Custom' Placement. [Help](https://help.getswym.com/en/articles/13249541-how-to-find-css-selectors-for-custom-button-placement)
We recommend using the Admin App to configure these settings. [Open App](/admin/apps/swym-relay)

settings.label: Add to Wishlist HTML
settings.info: Customize the button's appearance for products not yet saved to the wishlist.

settings.label: Added to Wishlist HTML
settings.info: Customize the button's appearance for products already in the wishlist.

settings.label: Custom Styling (CSS)
settings.info: Modify CSS here to fine-tune the button's design and ensure it matches your theme perfectly.

settings.content: Configure the wishlist button that appears on collection pages. This button allows customers to add products to their wishlist directly from collection listings. [Help](https://help.getswym.com/en/articles/13712073-customizing-the-advanced-wishlist-button-on-collections-pages)
settings.info: We recommend using the Admin App to configure these settings. [Open App](/admin/apps/swym-relay)

settings.label: Enable Quick Save Button
settings.info: Enable Quick Save Button on Collections Pages

settings.label: Show Social Count
settings.info: Display the number of times a product has been wishlisted

settings.label: Button HTML (Before Adding)
settings.info: Custom HTML for the wishlist button before a product is added. Leave empty to use default

settings.label: Button HTML (After Adding)
settings.info: Custom HTML for the wishlist button after a product is added. Leave empty to use default

settings.label: Button CSS
settings.info: CSS styles for the wishlist button. Leave empty to use default styles.

settings.label: Product URL Selector
settings.info: CSS selector to find product links on collection pages. [Help](https://help.getswym.com/en/articles/13712096-finding-selectors-for-advanced-collections-quick-save)

settings.label: Button Container Selector
settings.info: CSS selector for where to attach the wishlist button. [Help](https://help.getswym.com/en/articles/13712096-finding-selectors-for-advanced-collections-quick-save)

settings.content: Configure the wishlist launcher icon that appears in your store header. This icon provides quick access to the wishlist page and can display the count of saved products.
settings.info: We recommend using the Admin App to configure these settings. [Open App](/admin/apps/swym-relay)

settings.label: Enable Header Icon
